examples.korean: I’ll teach you to call me a liar! 발음듣기 나를 거짓말쟁이라고 하면 혼낼 줄 알어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll teach you to call me a liar! 발음

examples.korean: It was a very polished performance, but it lacked soul. 발음듣기 그것은 아주 세련된 공연이었지만 혼이 담겨 있지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a very polished performance, but it lacked soul. 발음

examples.korean: Let’s go back. Your parents must be getting frantic by now. 발음듣기 돌아가자. 지금쯤 너네 부모님은 반쯤 혼이 나가셨을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let’s go back. Your parents must be getting frantic by now. 발음

examples.korean: Yous need to be punished! 발음듣기 너희들 혼 좀 나야겠구나! 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Yous need to be punished! 발음

examples.korean: Butterhorn rolls smell sweet. 발음듣기 버터 혼 빵에서 맛있는 냄새가 났다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
